EmailTemplate.description: This is send to Staffing Associate record owner when job offer has not been responded to after 10 days
EmailTemplate.name: SF to Staffing Associate no response to job offer +10
EmailTemplate.subject: An applicant has not responded to the job offer
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {!Contact.OwnerFirstName},
You sent an email offering a role to {!Contact.FirstName} {!Contact.LastName} on {!Job_Application__c.00NC0000005ESh2}. 10 days have now passed and they have not responded.
Please click on this link to review the record: {!Job_Application__c.Link}
Thanks,
Central Operations
This is a standard email, sent automatically 10 days after an offer is sent to an applicant and they have not responded.
